thread.section_title: Its4women Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Its4women | www.its4women.ie
thread.title: Louise Roche

author: Louise Roche
title: Louise Roche
text:
I've been with its4women for a few years, always thought I was covered for all scenarios, Reading policy and ensuring as a mother id never be caught out... your Main Web page states clearly "all policies include roadside assistance" (I have a screen shot as such) last month I had a blow out in Dublin City, being in a new car I had the puncture pump and no spare, the hole was too big for the pump to fill,
I rang my road side assistance, to be told by an external company I wasn't covered! I then had to walk 50mins in the rain across Dublin to put myself and two children on a bus back to Meath while I paid for my car to be towed and wheel changed in Dublin.
